message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $12000. I can do $14000, which is a compromise I'm willing to make. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13500?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I can see that you're getting closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13750. It's the highest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?
